summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MenuGenius Stripe payment integration. All subscription and credit purchase functionality is working correctly including backend APIs, frontend UI, and Stripe checkout integration.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - error handling works but status code differs

passed_tests: BACKEND: GET /api/subscriptions/plans returns 3 plans (Basic, Pro, Business) with correct structure
BACKEND: GET /api/credits/packages returns 3 packages (Starter, Professional, Enterprise) with correct structure
BACKEND: POST /api/subscriptions/checkout creates valid Stripe checkout sessions
BACKEND: POST /api/credits/checkout creates valid Stripe checkout sessions
BACKEND: Invalid package/plan IDs return proper 400 errors
FRONTEND: Admin Access button provides instant login to dashboard
FRONTEND: Dashboard Subscribe button navigates to /subscription page
FRONTEND: Dashboard Credits button navigates to /credits page
FRONTEND: Subscription page displays all 3 plans with correct pricing ($19.99, $49.99, $149.99)
FRONTEND: Subscription page displays correct credits per month (10, 30, 100)
FRONTEND: Credits page displays all 3 packages with correct pricing ($9.99, $24.99, $69.99)
FRONTEND: Credits page displays correct credit amounts (5, 15, 50)
FRONTEND: Subscribe buttons redirect to Stripe checkout successfully
FRONTEND: Purchase buttons redirect to Stripe checkout successfully
FRONTEND: Navigation between subscription and credits pages works
FRONTEND: Current balance (9982 credits) displayed correctly on credits page

success_percentage.backend_stripe_integration: 94% (16/17 tests passed - 1 minor status code issue)
